name: 3D Platformer SGD102 (Kage 9950)
description:
This game was designed and created using C++ code in the Unreal Engine 4.27 and was based on the Hour of Code project files.

Utilize powerups to reach new areas, but be careful not to fall platforms and into the void. Jump and run your way across islands to collect different powerups and to find the key to unlock the door to the next level.

~Keyboard Controls~
 WASD - Character Movement

Spacebar - Jump. Double Jump if Spacebar is pressed a second time

Left Shift (Hold) - Sprint

E Key  - Interact 

Alt F4 - Quit

~Gamepad Controls~

Left Thumbstick - Character Movement

Left Trigger (Hold) - Sprint

A/X Button - Jump. Double Jump if button is pressed a second time

Y/△ Button - Interact

~Minimum System Requirements~

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

OS: Windows 10

Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom 2 X4 965

Memory: 4GB Ram

Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7750 | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260

Storage: 800MB available space
